Requirement.formula: #program; var hook = 'BFCM2017_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':GoldBoxItemsCount')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var count= Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(count == 1 || count == 3 || count == 4 || count == 6 || count == 7 || count == 8 || count == 10) { return true; } return false;

#program; var hook = 'BFCM2017_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':GoldBoxItemsCount')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var count= Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(count == 2 || count == 3 || count == 5 || count == 6 || count == 7 || count == 9 || count == 10) { return true; } return false;

#program; var hook = 'BFCM2017_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':GoldBoxItemsCount')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var count= Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(count == 4 || count == 5 || count == 6 || count == 8 || count == 9 || count == 10) { return true; } return false;

#program; var hook = 'BFCM2017_Hooks'; Hook::load(hook,false); var compiledHook = Parser::compile(Hook::toString(hook+':GoldBoxItemsCount')); Hook::unload(hook,false); var count= Parser::evaluate(compiledHook); if(count == 7 || count == 8 || count == 9 || count == 10) { return true; } return false;
